mapper.select: SELECT csat_sel_code, user_code, sub_mir_cat_com_kor, sub_mir_cat_sel_kor, sub_mir_cat_com_math, sub_mir_cat_sel_math, sub_mir_cat_inq1, sub_mir_cat_inq2, sub_mir_cat_lang, sub_mir_cat_lang2, sub_mir_cat_kh, smic1.sub_mir_cat_nm as smcsknm, smic2.sub_mir_cat_nm as smcsmnm, smic3.sub_mir_cat_nm as smci1nm, smic4.sub_mir_cat_nm as smci2nm, smic5.sub_mir_cat_nm as smcl2nm, smic6.sub_mir_cat_nm as smcknm FROM CSAT cs LEFT JOIN sub_mir_cat smic1 ON smic1.sub_mir_cat_code = cs.sub_mir_cat_sel_kor LEFT JOIN sub_mir_cat smic2 ON smic2.sub_mir_cat_code = cs.sub_mir_cat_sel_math LEFT JOIN sub_mir_cat smic3 ON smic3.sub_mir_cat_code = cs.sub_mir_cat_inq1 LEFT JOIN sub_mir_cat smic4 ON smic4.sub_mir_cat_code = cs.sub_mir_cat_inq2 LEFT JOIN sub_mir_cat smic5 ON smic5.sub_mir_cat_code = cs.sub_mir_cat_lang2 LEFT JOIN sub_mir_cat smic6 ON smic6.sub_mir_cat_code = cs.sub_mir_cat_kh where user_code = #{id};
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT('csat_', 1) ELSE CONCAT('csat_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(csat_sel_code, 'csat_', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS idx FROM CSAT;
insert into CSAT VALUES( #{idx}, #{usercode}, #{smcck}, #{smcsk}, #{smccm}, #{smcsm}, #{smci1}, #{smci2}, #{smcl1}, #{smcl2}, #{smck} );
mapper.update:
update CSAT
sub_mir_cat_sel_kor = #{smcsk},
sub_mir_cat_sel_math = #{smcsm},
sub_mir_cat_inq1 = #{smci1},
sub_mir_cat_inq2 = #{smci2},
sub_mir_cat_lang2 = #{smcl2}
WHERE csat_sel_code = #{idx};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CSAT cs WHERE cs.csat_sel_code = #{idx};
mapper.select:
SELECT target_university_code, user_code, target_university_name, target_university_lesson, target_university_rangking
FROM target_university where user_code = #{id};
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT('tuc', 1) ELSE CONCAT('tuc', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(target_university_code, 'tuc', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS targetUniverseCode FROM target_university tu;
insert into target_university VALUES( #{targetUniverseCode}, #{usercode}, #{targetUniversityName}, #{targetUniversityLesson}, #{targetUniversityRangking} );
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM target_university tu WHERE tu.target_university_code = #{targetUniverseCode};
mapper.select: select og.obj_grade_code, og.user_code, og.sub_mjr_cat_code, og.sub_mir_cat_code, og.last_grade_set, og.recent_grade_set, og.obj_grade_set, smjc.sub_mjr_cat_code, smjc.sub_mjr_cat_nm, smic.sub_mir_cat_code, smic.sub_mir_cat_nm FROM obejctive_grade og JOIN sub_mjr_cat smjc ON og.sub_mjr_cat_code = smjc.sub_mjr_cat_code JOIN sub_mir_cat smic ON og.sub_mir_cat_code = smic.sub_mir_cat_code where og.user_code = #{id};
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT('ogc', 1) ELSE CONCAT('ogc', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(obj_grade_code, 'ogc', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS gradeCode FROM obejctive_grade;
insert into obejctive_grade (obj_grade_code, user_code, sub_mjr_cat_code, sub_mir_cat_code, last_grade_set, recent_grade_set, obj_grade_set, result_grade_set, count_grade_set) SELECT #{gradeCode}, #{UserCode}, #{smjcc}, #{smicc}, IF(${lastGrade}=0, IFNULL(AVG(last_grade_set), 1), ${lastGrade}), ${recentGrade}, ${tar_grade_set}, IF(SUM(result_grade_set)=0, IFNULL((${recentGrade}),0), SUM(result_grade_set)), COUNT(result_grade_set)+1 FROM obejctive_grade WHERE user_code=#{UserCode} ORDER BY obj_grade_code desc LIMIT 1
mapper.update:
update obejctive_grade
sub_mjr_cat_code = #{smjcc},
sub_mir_cat_code = #{smicc},
last_grade_set = #{lastGrade},
recent_grade_set =#{recentGrade} ,
obj_grade_set = #{tar_grade_set},
result_grade_set = #{result_grade_set},
count_grade_set = #{count_grade_set}
WHERE obj_grade_code = #{gradeCode};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM obejctive_grade og WHERE og.obj_grade_code= #{gradeCode};
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT('les', 1) ELSE CONCAT('les', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(learning_schedule, 'les', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS learningSchedule FROM learning_schedule;
insert into learning_schedule VALUES( #{learningSchedule}, #{userCode}, #{smjcc}, #{smicc}, #{learningScheduleMemo}, #{learningScheduleDay}, #{learningScheduleStart}, #{learningScheduleEnd}, #{learningScheduleCompleate} );
mapper.update:
UPDATE learning_schedule
sub_mjr_cat_code = #{smjcc},
sub_mir_cat_code = #{smicc},
learning_schedule_memo = #{learningScheduleMemo},
learning_schedule_days = #{learningScheduleDay},
learning_schedule_start = #{learningScheduleStart},
learning_schedule_end = #{learningScheduleEnd},
learning_schedule_compleate = #{learningScheduleCompleate}
WHERE learning_schedule = #{learningSchedule};
mapper.select:
SELECT detailed_schedule_code, user_code, learning_schedule, detailed_schedule_memo, detailed_schedule_date, detailed_schedule_starttime, detailed_schedule_endtime, detailed_schedule_studytime, detailed_schedule_result
FROM detailed_schedule where user_code = #{id};
mapper.update:
update detailed_schedule
learning_schedule = #{learningSchedule},
detailed_schedule_memo = #{detailedScheduleMemo},
detailed_schedule_date = #{detailedScheduleDate},
detailed_schedule_starttime = #{detailedScheduleStartTime},
detailed_schedule_endtime = #{detailedScheduleEndTime},
detailed_schedule_studytime = #{detailedScheduleStudyTime},
detailed_schedule_result = #{detailedScheduleResult}
WHERE detailed_schedule_code = #{detailedSchedule};
mapper.delete: delete FROM detailed_schedule ds where ds.detailed_schedule_code = #{detailedSchedule};
mapper.select:
SELECT question_scrape_code, user_code, exam_code, exam_qna_code, question_scrape_memo, question_scrape_level, question_scrape_time, question_scrapemodify_time, question_scrape_result
FROM question_scrape;
mapper.update: update question_scrape qs SET qs.exam_code = #{examCode}, qs.exam_qna_code = #{examQnaCode}, qs.question_scrape_memo = #{questionScrapeMemo}, qs.question_scrape_level = #{questionScrapeLevel}, qs.question_scrapemodify_time = NOW(), qs.question_scrape_result = #{questionScrapeResult} WHERE qs.question_scrape_code = #{questionScrape};
mapper.delete: delete FROM question_scrape qs where qs.question_scrape_code = #{questionScrape};
mapper.select:
SELECT solving_history, question_scrape_code, user_code, sub_mjr_cat_code, sub_mir_cat_code, solving_date, qna_code, solving_type, solving_qna_type, solving_history_note, solving_history_count
FROM problem_solving_history;
mapper.update: update problem_solving_history psh SET psh.question_scrape_code = #{questionScrapeCode}, psh.sub_mjr_cat_code = #{smjcc}, psh.sub_mir_cat_code = #{smicc}, psh.solving_date = NOW(), psh.qna_code = #{qnaCode}, psh.solving_type = #{solvingType}, psh.solving_qna_type = #{solvingcategory}, psh.solving_history_note = #{solvingHistoryNote}, psh.solving_history_count = #{solvingHistoryCount} WHERE psh.solving_history = #{solvingHistory};
mapper.delete: delete FROM problem_solving_history psh where psh.solving_history = #{solvingHistory};
mapper.select: SELECT ls.learning_schedule AS FullSchedule, ds.detailed_schedule_code AS detailed, ls.user_code AS usercode, ls.sub_mjr_cat_code AS submjr, ls.sub_mir_cat_code AS submir, ls.learning_schedule_memo AS lesMemo, ls.learning_schedule_days AS days, ls.learning_schedule_start AS startDay, ls.learning_schedule_end AS endDay, ls.learning_schedule_compleate AS compleateMemo, ds.detailed_schedule_memo AS detailMemo, ds.detailed_schedule_date AS detailDate, ds.detailed_schedule_starttime AS startTime, ds.detailed_schedule_endtime AS endTime, ds.detailed_schedule_studytime AS studyTime, ds.detailed_schedule_result AS result FROM learning_schedule ls right JOIN detailed_schedule ds ON ls.learning_schedule = ds.learning_schedule where ls.user_code = #{id};
